channel.title: Glory help!
channel.description:
ok. i don't know how to add teleports for the glory. when it's in your inv you can right click and rub it but nothing happens. how do i add the options for it and were it tele's you to. also when u right click it on your neck there isn't a "operate" how would i add this.
----------server----------- rsps 317
delta base.
